title: Blended Research-Based Educational Program for Enhancing Interprofessional Collaboration Competencies in Healthcare

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in healthcare system operations and management, basic understanding of interdisciplinary teamwork
context.additional_context: Focuses on strengthening practical competencies in collaborative environments with diverse medical professionals (doctors, nurses, physical therapists, etc.) as healthcare service managers in corporate settings

learning_goals: Participants can analyze interprofessional collaboration models and derive practical improvement strategies using mixed research methodologies.
Participants can design effective decision-making processes in real-case scenario-based simulations by applying the Interprofessional Education (IPE) framework.
Participants can diagnose collaboration barriers and develop resolution strategies through team-based project execution, and present outcomes according to evaluation criteria.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
